title: The rambling justice, or, The jealous husbands with the humours of Sir John Twiford : as it is acted at the Theatre Royal / by John Leanerd.
author: Leanerd, John, fl. 1679.
publisher: Printed by E. F. for Thomas Quell and James Vade ...,
notes: In part from Middleton's "More dissemblers besides women."
Later published with title: The jealous husbands.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
